net.sourceforge.taglets.driver.impl
Class ReplacementResourceBundle

java.lang.Object
  java.util.ResourceBundle
      net.sourceforge.taglets.driver.impl.ReplacementResourceBundle

public class ReplacementResourceBundle
extends ResourceBundle

Resource bundle that replaces certain keys in another resource bundle.

Version:
1.8 (2008/03/30 12:43:24)
Maintainer:
Bruno Essmann <essmann@sourceforge.net>
Since:
1.3.0

private final ResourceBundle delegate
The resource bundle to delegate requests to if they are not in the property list of resources to replace.

Constructor Detail

ReplacementResourceBundle

public ReplacementResourceBundle(ResourceBundle delegate,
                                 String[][] replacements)
Creates a new replacement resource bundle for the specified delegate resource bundle and replacement properties.

Parameters:
delegate - the resource bundle to delegate requests to.
replacements - a list of key/value pairs, each entry in the list has to consist of a string array with a key and a value.
Since:
1.3.0

ReplacementResourceBundle

protected ReplacementResourceBundle(ResourceBundle delegate,
                                    Properties replacements)
Creates a new replacement resource bundle for the specified delegate resource bundle and replacement properties.

Parameters:
delegate - the resource bundle to delegate requests to.
replacements - the properties to replace in the delegate resource bundle, the replacement resource bundle is the new owner of the properties object passed in.
Since:
1.3.0
Method Detail

createProperties

private static final Properties createProperties(String[][] keyValues)
Creates a new properties object for the specified list of key/value pairs.

Parameters:
keyValues - a list of key/value pairs, each entry in the list has to consist of a string array with a key and a value.
Returns:
the properties object requested.
Since:
1.3.0

getKeys

public Enumeration getKeys()
Specified by:
getKeys in class ResourceBundle
Implementation Notes:
Returns a combined enumeration that includes the keys of the delegate resource bundle as well as all replacement keys, duplicate keys are only enumerated once.
Since:
1.3.0

handleGetObject

protected Object handleGetObject(String key)
Specified by:
handleGetObject in class ResourceBundle
Implementation Notes:
If available returns the replacement value, delegates to the parent using ResourceBundle.getObject(String) if there is not replacement.
Since:
1.3.0
